about_the_game:
Classic arcade fishing vane, opening a new era of fishing, massive gold coins every day, luxury gift packs are constantly sent! The game is a masterpiece of ingenuity, expanding many ways to play! Picture upgrade, explosion rate upgrade, welfare upgrade, all upgrade! Super high gun times, super many BOSS, super high rate, super good explosion, one shot to get rich, I wish you a rich man!
[New picture era upgrade]
Film-level ultra-high picture quality, created by the top domestic art and technical expert team, Dolby sound 3D surround, bringing you an unprecedented fishing experience.
[Ancient beasts are coming]
Mermaids with charming styles, mechanical sharks of future technology, mysterious and powerful dark dragons, ancient beasts that master darkness, special boss scene interactions and event gameplay, perfect immersive experience, more mysterious bosses are waiting for you to explore!
[Super weapons destroy the world]
Real innovative experience, lasers that can hit the sky and the earth in seconds, nuclear bombs that bomb everything, rampaging warheads, thunder strikes with all the power, etc., are bound to make you feel refreshed!
[Random events make you rich overnight]
The unique boss awakening event allows you to experience what it means to be lucky! Fun! Good-looking! So exciting!
[Super many benefits for free]
Log in to get a lot of gold coins, daily tasks, festival gameplay, and multiple benefits for leaders.
[Powerful turrets with cool wings]
Exclusively customized turret skins and wings system, so that you can also be dazzling and stunning in the world of fishing!
[Classic Arcade Super Gold]
A mainstream fishing game with classic arcade gameplay, easy to catch fish, super high gold explosion rate, real one shot gold explosion!

name: 捕鱼金蟾去哪了

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7-11
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster

publishers: 郑州塔比网络科技有限公司
short_description: Classic arcade fishing vane, opening a new era of fishing, massive gold coins every day, luxury gift packs are sent continuously! The game is a masterpiece with many ways to play! Picture upgrade, explosion rate upgrade, welfare upgrade, all upgrades!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
